burgers.name: Classic Cheeseburger
burgers.description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, tomato, and pickles, all inside a toasted sesame bun.

burgers.name: Bacon BBQ Burger
burgers.description: A savory burger with crispy bacon, smoky BBQ sauce, cheddar cheese, and crispy onion rings on a toasted brioche bun.

burgers.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
burgers.description: A flavorful combination of saut√©ed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli on a toasted whole-grain bun.

burgers.name: Spicy Jalapeno Burger
burgers.description: A spicy delight featuring pepper jack cheese, fresh jalapenos, and chipotle mayo on a toasted pretzel bun.

burgers.name: Vegan Delight Burger
burgers.description: A plant-based patty with vegan cheese, avocado, lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo on a gluten-free bun.
